programme.desc: Billy wastes money on a stolen statue and Joey tries to claim an incontinence allowance for Grandad. First episode of Carla Lane's comedy, with Jean Boht and Peter Howitt.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Lionel has a habit of being unpredictable, but when he walks off and abandons his wife while out on a drive in the hills, it is left to Clegg, Truly and Billy to console her. Long-running comedy set in Yorkshire, from the pen of Roy Clarke. Roy Hudd guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Billy celebrates his ancestor Robin Hood's birthday by proudly wearing a green suit, and gullible Barry pays tribute in his own way - much to the amusement of everyone else. Long-running comedy set in Yorkshire, from the pen of Roy Clarke. Keith Clifford and Mike Grady star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Who's That with Barry and Glenda?.
programme.desc: Truly jumps to the conclusion that Barry is up to no good after he is spotted acting suspiciously, but his real motive for being in the woods with a suitcase is unfathomable. Long-running comedy, staring Mike Grady, Frank Thornton and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part One: The American Dream.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Trotters get a chance to escape Peckham for a holiday in the Florida sun - but it means Del leaving his newborn son behind. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star, with Buster Merryfield, Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong, Denis Lill and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part Two: Oh to Be in England.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Trotters arrive in Florida, and walk straight into disaster after their camper van is burgled and local Mafiosi take a shine to Del-Boy, who bears more than a passing resemblance to their boss. What Del does not know is that they are planning to have him killed as a way of faking the godfather's death to help him escape being sent to prison. Feature-length episode of the comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst, with a cameo appearance by Bee Gee Barry Gibb.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Always one to jump on the latest passing bandwagon, Del-Boy goes eco-friendly and decides to create a better world for baby Damien and his generation - by starting his own bottled water business. Starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Buster Merryfield and Tessa Peake-Jones. Christmas special from 1992.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy enters the import trade after striking a deal with Boycie to fetch a consignment of dodgy diamonds across from Holland, and ropes in Rodney and Uncle Albert to help. Their plans are jeopardised when old foe Chief Inspector Slater picks up the Trotters' trail. Feature-length episode of the comedy, guest starring Jim Broadbent, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney leaves home after a fight with Cassandra, and arranges a date with receptionist Tanya in an effort to make his wife jealous - but Del's interference ensures the plan fails to go as smoothly as it should. Christmas special first shown in 1990, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Agnes is disappointed to discover she is not invited to Maria's hen party because of her age, and decides to gatecrash the event, only to end up at the wrong venue. She then tries to impress the bride-to-be's mother during a dinner date, but is so nervous she turns to drink, and the evening descends into chaos. Comedy, written by and starring Brendan O'Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the stand-up show from the world-famous Hammersmith Apollo, London, with guest comedian Alan Carr. The funnymen talk about bullies, estate agents and bread-making machines.(n)

programme.title: The Young Ones
programme.desc: The lads borrow a video recorder so they can watch some video nasties, only to end up being terrorised by a vampire driving instructor. programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: After six gruelling weeks, the finalists' last challenge is to prepare a three-course menu for Michel Roux Jr, Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace, drawing on everything they have learnt during the competition and over the course of their careers. programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off: Wedding Cake Special.
programme.desc: Cookery writer Mary Berry and professional baker Paul Hollywood explore the history of the British wedding cake, from the earliest Tudor creation to the present day.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The contestants are sent to the Catalonia region of Spain to learn new culinary skills. They begin by cooking tapas in a local market, before meeting two of the country's most highly regarded chefs - Christian Escriba and Carles Abellan. Both men have cooked at world-famous restaurant el Bulli, known for its scientific approach to its recipes - some of which Carles teaches the contestants here, before they are let loose in the kitchen to prepare their own dishes for a surprise diner.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers celebrate comfort food as they travel around West Yorkshire and Lancashire. They sample a meat and potato pie made from a family recipe, a ginger sponge and custard prepared by a mother and daughter, and a curry recipe taken from a homemade cookbook. The pair also create their own comforting meals, including oxtail stew and creamy tomato soup with rouille.(n)

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.desc: The food writer provides more culinary ideas as he prepares five dishes with ingredients that are often overlooked, including beetroot cake, a lentil and chard stew, and a beef and ale casserole. Nigel also visits Derbyshire and helps two keen gardeners create food with produce from their own plot.(n)

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Selena was a 23-year old Tejana singer on the verge of an international breakthrough when she was shot by the president of her own fan club. Her death spawned an outpouring of grief not seen since the death of Elvis Presley. This upbeat and tuneful biopic, executive produced by her father, Abraham Quintanilla (portrayed in the film by Edward James Olmos), is a celebration of his daughter's life, chronicling her rise to fame. The film opens with Selena (Jennifer Lopez) performing at the Houston Astrodome before a sold-out audience. The story moves backwards and begins not with Selena, but with Abraham who in the early '60s had an unsuccessful doo-wop group in Texas. As a child, Selena (Rebecca Lee Meza) showed an exceptional talent for singing. Abraham exploited that and the talents of his other two children to form a band. Much of the film focuses on the fact that Selena, though born in Texas in a Mexican-American community, had to learn Spanish as a second language. Her father insisted that she sing in the language, but it was not easy for her. To maintain the story's celebratory air, it only lightly touches on Selena's relationship with her killer -- the actual shooting occurs off-screen. The after-effects of Selena's death are also only briefly presented(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a chauvinistic advertising executive who acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking, attempting to use this power to bring about the fall of his female boss. But as he uses this inside knowledge to outwit his superior, the bachelor begins to fall in love with her, and so finds himself feeling more than a little guilty when his plan to have her sacked looks like it may come to fruition. But as he uses this inside knowledge to outwit his superior, the bachelor begins to fall in love with her, and so finds himself feeling more than a little guilty when his plan to have her sacked looks like it may come to fruition(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: The Visit is a comedic horror film from director M. Night Shyamalan that follows a pair of children whose lives are changed drastically when their mother (Kathryn Hahn) takes them to visit their grandparents. After seeing their grandparents engaged in activities that they had been kept as a secret to the entire family previously, they are endangered and rendered potentially unable to ever return to their previous existence. The movie co-stars Peter McRobbie and Deanna Dunagan, with music from Hans Zimmer(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: This mockumentary satire of the music business and modern celebrity centers on self-absorbed pop rapper Conner4Real (Andy Samberg). Once a member of a popular rap trio called the Style Boyz, Conner is now a solo artist about to drop his second album. Unfortunately, the release gets abysmal reviews, and his career begins to melt down when his attempts at rehabing his image lead to such disasters as a global blackout and a proposal to his girlfriend interrupted by a wolf attack. Eventually, Conner considers burying the hatchet with former colleagues Owen (Jorma Taccone) and Lawrence (Akiva Schaffer) in order to reunite the Style Boyz. Tim Meadows, Maya Rudolph, Sarah Silverman, and Imogen Poots co-star. Samberg, Taccone, and Schaffer co-wrote the screenplay, while Taccone and Schaffer shared directing duties(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Mel Gibson directed this biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss (played here by Andrew Garfield). A conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon, Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. Hugo Weaving, Teresa Palmer, Vince Vaughn, and Sam Worthington co-star in Gibson's return to the director's seat(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a covert agent who often finds himself out of his depths but never out of options. It's CONTROL veruss KAOS all over again as this action comedy based on a beloved hit TV series from the sixties pits Agent 86 against a nuclear scheme by the evil spy conglomerate. Partnered with sexy and capable Agent 99 (Anne Hathaway), he navigates the world of multifunction pocketknives and exploding dental floss to hilarious effect. The all-star cast is rounded up by Dwayne Johnson, Terence Stamp, Alan Arkin and James Caan(n)

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra
programme.desc: The story of flamboyant musician Liberace's tempestuous relationship with his much younger lover Scott Thorson(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving the jungle and settling down with his wife Jane in London, Tarzan returns to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England. However, he soon clashes with a greedy Belgian captain who has sinister plans for his old home(n)

programme.title: Indignation
programme.desc: A young Jewish atheist attends university in 1951 Ohio, where he clashes with the school's established social order(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: In this slick comedy, mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie biz for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer(n)

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: Dedicated to his mentors Sergio Leone and Don Siegel, Clint Eastwood's 1992 Oscar-winner examines the mythic violence of the Western, taking on the ghosts of his own star past. Disgusted by Sheriff "Little Bill" Daggett's decree that several ponies make up for a cowhand's slashing a whore's face, Big Whiskey prostitutes, led by fierce Strawberry Alice (Frances Fisher), take justice into their own hands and put a $1000 bounty on the lives of the perpetrators. Notorious outlaw-turned-hog farmer William Munny (Eastwood) is sought out by neophyte gunslinger the Schofield Kid (Jaimz Woolvett) to go with him to Big Whiskey and collect the bounty. While Munny insists, "I ain't like that no more," he needs the bounty money for his children, and the two men convince Munny's clean-living comrade Ned Logan (Morgan Freeman) to join them in righting a wrong done to a woman. Little Bill (Oscar-winner Gene Hackman), however, has no intention of letting any bounty hunters impinge on his iron-clad authority. When pompous gunman English Bob (Richard Harris) arrives in Big Whiskey with pulp biographer W.W. Beauchamp (Saul Rubinek) in tow, Little Bill beats Bob senseless and promises to tell Beauchamp the real story about violent frontier life and justice. But when Munny, the true unwritten legend, comes to town, everyone soon learns a harsh lesson about the price of vindictive bloodshed and the malleability of ideas like "justice." "I don't deserve this," pleads Little Bill. "Deserve's got nothin' to do with it," growls Munny, simultaneously summing up the insanity of western violence and the legacy of Eastwood's Man With No Name(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Director Christopher Nolan follows up his breakthrough sophomore film Memento with this remake of a stylish Norwegian thriller. Al Pacino stars as Detective Will Dormer, a Los Angeles Police Department legend who temporarily escapes an internal affairs investigation that may ruin his career by traveling to Nightmute, AK, the remote site of a murder that has the local authorities flummoxed. Along with his partner, Hap Eckhart (Martin Donovan), and the small town's wide-eyed rookie investigator, Ellie Burr (Hilary Swank), the exhausted Dormer probes the brutal slaying of a teenage girl who was rumored to have a secret lover. A clever ruse quickly lures the killer into a police trap, but the suspect escapes and a tragic accident at the scene leaves Dormer at the mercy of the murderer, a pulp crime novelist named Walter Finch (Robin Williams). As Finch plays a dangerous game of extortion with Dormer, the detective's mental health deteriorates rapidly from guilt over his complicity in a crime and sleep deprivation compounded by the lack of darkness in the land of the midnight sun. Meanwhile, the bright and dogged Ellie continues putting the pieces of a complex puzzle together despite Dormer's skillful attempts to lead the investigation toward the right suspect, but away from his own malfeasance. Insomnia co-stars Paul Dooley, Nicky Katt, Maura Tierney, and Jonathan Jackson(n)

programme.title: Bend It like Beckham
programme.desc: Parminder K Nagra, Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys-Meyers, Anupam Kher, Archie Panjabi. The comic tale of a young Asian woman who joins the local semi-professional football team but opts not to tell her traditionalist family, who want her to go to law school and settle down with a nice Indian boy. She finds it increasingly difficult to deal with her double life as a dutiful daughter and a talented footballer(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: This charged drama looks at the world of brokerage houses that sell bogus stocks to unsuspecting customers. Giovanni Ribisi is outstanding as a recruit who learns to trade on customers' trust in order to sell them shares in worthless companies. Costar Ben Affleck is first-rate as a driven broker who "could sell bubble gum at the lockjaw ward at Bellevue." Nia Long, Vin Diesel, Nicky Katt(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman (Ben Affleck) and Superman (Henry Cavill) clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world, while the public they're defending is becoming increasingly mindful of the damage that superheroes and masked vigilantes cause. However, the duo are soon forced to confront an even greater threat created by nefarious billionaire Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg). Directed by Zack Snyder, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice also co-stars Amy Adams as Lois Lane, Jeremy Irons as Alfred the butler, and Gal Gadot as Wonder Woman(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, he agrees to help an accounting clerk look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated(n)

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: While Santa Claus rewards good children with gifts on Christmas, Krampus, a beast-like creature with demonic appearance, seeks out naughty children and punishes them(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Insecure as F**k. Two black women who are best friends navigate the pitfalls of their personal and professional lives in south Los Angeles in this comedy, which begins with Issa wondering if her relationship with her boyfriend is still worth the effort, while Molly's success as an attorney barely masks her dissatisfaction with her romantic prospects(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Messy as F**k. Molly lines up a date with a promising prospect after treating herself to a day at the salon. Meanwhile, Issa isn't sure how she feels about Lawrence, who tries to make amends for forgetting her birthday(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Racist as F**k. Jared meets Molly's friends; Issa confronts her cow-orkers' lack of confidence in her; Lawrence is taken aback by a headhunter's remarks; Molly's pep talk to a new summer associate at work fails to connect(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Thirsty as F**k. Issa seeks Daniel's help for Career Day even though she and Lawrence are getting along just fine. Meanwhile, a partner puts Molly in an awkward position with another employee; and Lawrence finds a way to deal with his downer of a new job(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Shady as F**k. Issa is mortified when a video of her profanity-laced rap at an open-mic night goes viral(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Guilty as F**k. Issa tries to hide her guilt from Lawrence, who reiterates his love for her. Meanwhile, Molly dives into a new romance, but has second thoughts about the future after learning unsavory details about her new boyfriend's past(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Real as F**k. Issa preps for a fund-raiser, but has trouble staying focused. Meanwhile, Lawrence mulls a job opportunity; and Molly learns something new from an old friend(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Broken as F**k. In the Season 1 finale, Molly and Issa's trip could be undone by lingering tension between them; and Lawrence catches up with his friends(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include an interview with Chechen leader and MMA figure Ramzan Kadyrov; a look at global warming's effect on the Great Barrier Reef; a visit with MLB Hall of Famer Rod Carew, who underwent a heart and kidney transplant last December(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 3. Part 3 of 4. Jimmy co-founds Interscope Records and cuts a deal with Death Row Records to become the label's distributor. But hostility mounts across America at the violence in rap music. Jimmy, Snoop Dogg and Tupac Shakur become embroiled in a violent feud with East Coast rap rivals, including Sean "Puffy" Combs and his Bad Boy Records(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 4. Part 4 of 4. Dre produces Eminem's "The Slim Shady LP" that takes the rap music world by storm. Later, Dre and Jimmy create Beats Electronics and make a historic 2014 deal with Apple(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A slick, trigger-happy detective flouts the law as he goes on the hunt for a rich murderer whose power and influence could get him off the hook(n)

programme.title: HBO First Look: 'War for the Planet of the Apes'
programme.desc: A look at "War for the Planet of the Apes," a 2017 thriller about an ape army's struggle against homo sapiens. The film stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn, and is directed by Matt Reeves(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: When evil robot The Fallen threatens to destroy Earth, it's up to Sam Witwicky and the heroic Autobots to foil his plans(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Exhilarating and emotionally powerful Best Picture about an illiterate orphan from the slums of India who is on the verge of winning the ultimate prize on a popular TV quiz show(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a covert agent who often finds himself out of his depths but never out of options. It's CONTROL veruss KAOS all over again as this action comedy based on a beloved hit TV series from the sixties pits Agent 86 against a nuclear scheme by the evil spy conglomerate. Partnered with sexy and capable Agent 99 (Anne Hathaway), he navigates the world of multifunction pocketknives and exploding dental floss to hilarious effect. The all-star cast is rounded up by Dwayne Johnson, Terence Stamp, Alan Arkin and James Caan(n)

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra
programme.desc: The story of flamboyant musician Liberace's tempestuous relationship with his much younger lover Scott Thorson(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving the jungle and settling down with his wife Jane in London, Tarzan returns to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England. However, he soon clashes with a greedy Belgian captain who has sinister plans for his old home(n)

programme.title: Indignation
programme.desc: A young Jewish atheist attends university in 1951 Ohio, where he clashes with the school's established social order(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: In this slick comedy, mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie biz for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer(n)

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: Dedicated to his mentors Sergio Leone and Don Siegel, Clint Eastwood's 1992 Oscar-winner examines the mythic violence of the Western, taking on the ghosts of his own star past. Disgusted by Sheriff "Little Bill" Daggett's decree that several ponies make up for a cowhand's slashing a whore's face, Big Whiskey prostitutes, led by fierce Strawberry Alice (Frances Fisher), take justice into their own hands and put a $1000 bounty on the lives of the perpetrators. Notorious outlaw-turned-hog farmer William Munny (Eastwood) is sought out by neophyte gunslinger the Schofield Kid (Jaimz Woolvett) to go with him to Big Whiskey and collect the bounty. While Munny insists, "I ain't like that no more," he needs the bounty money for his children, and the two men convince Munny's clean-living comrade Ned Logan (Morgan Freeman) to join them in righting a wrong done to a woman. Little Bill (Oscar-winner Gene Hackman), however, has no intention of letting any bounty hunters impinge on his iron-clad authority. When pompous gunman English Bob (Richard Harris) arrives in Big Whiskey with pulp biographer W.W. Beauchamp (Saul Rubinek) in tow, Little Bill beats Bob senseless and promises to tell Beauchamp the real story about violent frontier life and justice. But when Munny, the true unwritten legend, comes to town, everyone soon learns a harsh lesson about the price of vindictive bloodshed and the malleability of ideas like "justice." "I don't deserve this," pleads Little Bill. "Deserve's got nothin' to do with it," growls Munny, simultaneously summing up the insanity of western violence and the legacy of Eastwood's Man With No Name(n)

programme.desc: Gilbert Gottfried: Command Performance. Gilbert Gottfried harasses the audience; shares his theories on turtle care and on Elvis; imitates other comedians; and uses ripped napkins as props(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed comedy drama set behind the scenes of a successful news show(n)

programme.title: Life with Mikey
programme.desc: Michael J Fox, Christina Vidal, Nathan Lane, Cyndi Lauper. Comedy about a former child actor running a talent agency who attempts to turn a young pickpocket into the star of a series of TV commercials. As the agent gradually bonds with his charge, the pair learn some important lessons about growing up(n)

programme.title: I-Spy
programme.desc: The film revolves around a special stealth fighter jet that has gone missing. A spy named Alex Scott is asked to work on the case and he must team up with a boxing champion Kelly Robinson to catch Arnold Gundars, a dangerous illegal arms dealers(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites in this outrageous action comedy(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two mild-mannered cousins search for a beloved pet kitten after the feline is taken during a home burglary. However, they get in over their heads when their quest leads them to infiltrate a violent street gang by posing as drug dealers(n)

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Spike Lee received an Oscar nomination for his screenplay about racial tensions in a New York City neighbourhood(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Exuberant musical based on the hit stage show featuring the music of ABBA. 20-year-old Sophie lives on an idyllic Greek island with her free-spirited mother Donna. When Sophie gets engaged to her boyfriend, she decides that she wants her father at her wedding - but unfortunately, she does not know who her father is. She takes matters into her own hands and invites the three possible candidates to the wedding, without the knowledge of her mother. Will Donna reveal who Sophie's real dad is? And is she as reluctant to see her former lovers as she claims?(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Teen-angst comedy drama about five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - who are brought together on a day-long detention. Despite their original hostilities, and a psychotic teacher, the motley crew break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school(n)

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men
programme.desc: 1995. Odd couple Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau are reunited for this curmudgeonly comedy sequel. Two Italian women plan to turn the old guys' bait shop into a restaurant. Dir: Lorant Deutch(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites in this outrageous action comedy(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Friends Harold and Kumar decide to take a trip to Amsterdam when Harold finds out that his beloved Maria is heading to the city. After a few incidents at the airport, they finally get on the plane, but once again create more trouble when Kumar lights up his new bong and the air marshals think it's a bomb. Next stop: Guantanamo Bay prison, in Cuba. And the problems have just started..(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Teen-angst comedy drama about five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - who are brought together on a day-long detention. Despite their original hostilities, and a psychotic teacher, the motley crew break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Back in the late 1970s, author Cameron Crowe banked upon his youthful appearance to pose as a teen-aged high school student. The results of his hands-on research was the revelatory book Fast Times at Ridgemont High, which went on to spectacular success as a theatrical feature. The sociological inner lining of Crowe's book was sacrificed in favor of standard teen-movie dialogue and Animal House-style comedy, but the film is impossible to dislike, and it spawned a legion of future imitators. Ostensibly, the main characters are brother and sister Jennifer Jason Leigh and Judge Reinhold. However, the real breakthrough star is Sean Penn as the perpetually zoned-out Jeff Spicoli. It is Penn who has the film's most famous scene, wherein the decorum of teacher Hand (Ray Walston)'s classroom is interrupted by a pizza delivery. Fast Times at Ridgemont High was spun off into a TV series, the short-lived 1986 weekly Fast Times(n)

programme.title: Beginner's Guide to Sex
programme.desc: An innocent virgin, Laci Cox is hired to teach a high school students sexual education(n)

programme.title: The Man with Two Brains
programme.desc: A madcap brain surgeon, married to a beautiful but evil woman, falls in love with the brain of another lady who has everything he wants - except a body(n)

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg returns to the calling, as a singer helping the nuns run an inner-city school(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'
programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: The Lord of Darkness wants to retire but none of his three sons seems good enough for the job. When he decides he will not cede his throne to any of them, the two most powerful ones escape to Earth to create a kingdom for themselves. This action closes the portal filtering sinful souls to Hell and causes Satan to begin withering away. Now it's up to the weak but beloved Nicky to save his dad and the humankind before one of his brothers becomes the new Satan(n)

programme.title: Necessary Roughness
programme.desc: After sacking their old team, Texas State University hire a coach to assemble a new football team. The motley crew he collects includes a retired high-school football star, a military fanatic, a physics teacher and, as place kicker, a dishy female. Overcoming all obstacles on and off the field, they attempt to win the championship(n)

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Unshaven, chain-smoking archangel Michael is discovered in an elderly woman's home by a group of cynical tabloid reporters, who resolve to prove his existence to the world. Their cross-country journey becomes a quest for both redemption and love(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Spoof from the makers of the 'Naked Gun' series which tells the story of an Italian boy who, having moved to America, becomes involved with the Mafia. Contains parodies of scenes from 'Once upon a Time in America', 'Goodfellas', 'Casino' and 'The Godfather'(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: Offbeat comedy about a video store employee and his hapless friend, who, after managing to wipe the films in the shop, must remake all the movies themselves. After being threatened with copyright violation by industry bigwigs, the duo are aided by the store's loyal customers in a bid to make a legitimate and original film about a local hero(n)

programme.desc: Kirsten Sheridan's family drama stars Freddie Highmore as Evan Taylor, a musical prodigy searching for his parents. When pregnant cellist Lyla Novacek was hit by a car, her controlling father and manager told her she'd lost the baby; in reality she gave birth prematurely and her father sent the infant to an orphanage. Eleven years later, when Evan finds out that his parents are alive, he sets out to find them, taking inspiration from the music around him. The heart of the film is Evan's almost mystical ability to 'feel' music, a challenging concept that is rendered believable thanks to inventive work from the composer of the main score, Mark Mancina. When Beauty must keep company with the Beast to save her father's life, she is surprised by her change of heart. She soon learns that true goodness can lie beneath a rough exterior. programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: It's the year 2054, and crime has been eradicated in Washington. Thanks to the foretelling skills of three mutants called Pre-cogs, the future can be predicted and the guilty ones are convicted before committing any offence. These three psychic beings are part of the elitist Pre-Crime unit, within the Department of Justice. For the time being, their predictions have never failed. No one works with more enthusiasm than its boss, John Anderton, who due to a tragic loss dedicates his life to this cutting-edge project. Anderton supports and promotes this perfect system until he becomes the main suspect(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Off-beat comedy-drama starring Jeff Bridges as an unreconstructed hippy who calls himself The Dude. When he is visited by gangsters mistaking him for a wealthy industrialist known as the Big Lebowski, the Dude seeks out his namesake and is soon embroiled in a complex scheme which he has no hope of understanding, let alone surviving. This quirky film from the idiosyncratic Coen brothers was a hit with the critics and features the first ever point-of-view shot from inside a bowling ball. It's that kind of movie(n)

programme.title: Major Payne

When the army no long wants him, he becomes desperate for a job, but his only offer of work comes from a private school where he is to teach a mixed bunch of children combat skills(n)

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: Pop icon Marc Anthony steps into the role of Salsa superstar Hector Lavoe in this biopic that follows the singer from his early career success as a Puerto Rican teen sensation to his later status as a New York City Latin idol while also documenting his ongoing struggle against drug and alcohol addiction. Actress and pop star Jennifer Lopez co-stars as Puchi; Lavoe's longtime muse and love interest(n)

programme.title: The Quest
programme.desc: Martial arts movie star Jean-Claude Van Damme made his debut behind the camera as the director of this sweeping action drama. Van Damme stars as Chris Dubois, a clown pickpocket and Fagin-like leader of orphan thieves in 1925 New York City. Kidnapped by gun smugglers and then sold to pirate captain Lord Dobbs (Roger Moore), Chris eventually ends up the property of Khao (Aki Aleong), a master Asian kickboxer. His fighting skills win Chris a chance at a legendary contest, a gladiatorial showdown between champions of the world's many diverse combat styles in a Tibetan lost city. Along for the trip are the avaricious Dobbs, heavyweight boxing champ and fellow competitor Maxie (James Remar), and Carrie (Janet Gunn), a beautiful female reporter(n)

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: After a tragic accident kills his bride-to-be, the grieving would-be groom turns to a local psychic to help him through the pain. However, when romance blossoms between the pair, the spirit of his late partner resolves to ruin their relationship from beyond the grave(n)

programme.title: New Best Friend
programme.desc: Three rich, pretty people befriend their poor, mousy classmate and live to regret it in this teen-centric thriller. Alicia (Mia Kirshner), Hadley (Meredith Monroe), Julianne (Rachel True), and Sydney (Dominique Swain) are four students enrolled in the same sociology class at Colby University, an exclusive and respected college in the Carolinas. Alicia is a local girl born into modest circumstances who struggles to make ends meet and rarely gets a second look from the male students on campus, while Hadley, Julianne, and Sydney are close friends who all come from wealthy families and seem more concerned with partying than their studies. Alicia and Hadley are paired up to work on their semester project for the class, which is to be centered around the theme "Lead, Follow, or Get Out of the Way." As part of the project, Hadley decides to befriend Alicia, and brings her into her social circle. At first, Alicia seems more than grateful for the attention of her new friends, and blooms under the influence of Hadley, Julianne, and Sydney. But it isn't long before Alicia's personality begins to shift; she develops a powerful appetite for drugs and alcohol, and soon begins taking advantage of her new friendships. Things come to a head when Alicia seduces Sydney's boyfriend, Josh (Oliver Hudson), and soon Alicia ends up in the hospital after OD'ing on drugs. Artie Bonner (Taye Diggs), a local sheriff, begins looking into Alicia's case, convinced that her near-fatal accident with drugs was no accident at all(n)

programme.title: Snow Angels
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter David Gordon Green adapts Stewart O'Nan's popular novel to the screen in this feature, which tells the parallel tales of a teenager named Arthur (Michael Angarano) and his onetime babysitter Annie (Kate Beckinsale) -- whose turbulent relationship with her estranged husband, Glenn (Sam Rockwell), leads the small-town waitress down a troubled path. Arthur is a high-school student from a dysfunctional family, and does everything in his power to avoid hanging around the house while mom and dad quarrel. When he's not practicing his trombone and performing with the high-school marching band, Arthur can usually be found bussing tables at the local Chinese restaurant and flirting with older waitress Annie. Annie used to be Arthur's babysitter, and is currently struggling to separate from her former high-school sweetheart, Glenn. But being a single mother isn't easy, especially since the troubled Glenn wants nothing more than to clean up his act and reunite his family. Back at school, Arthur and pretty classmate Lila (Olivia Thirlby) have been bonding over their mutual love for all things geeky. Though the casual friendship shows promise of evolving into something more when Lila expresses her true feelings for Arthur, he can't help but becoming distracted by his chaotic family life: his father is moving out of the family home, and his mother is doing everything in her power to maintain some semblance of normalcy. Realizing that happiness is fleeting as his family becomes shattered and Annie experiences a series of distressing encounters with Glenn, Arthur gradually begins to fall for Lisa despite his growing cynicism concerning long-term relationships. Later, on a cold winter morning, Glenn and Annie's past catches up with them in a blinding flash, and the lives of everyone they know are suddenly and irrevocably changed(n)

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: A mysterious killer begins terrorising the cast of horror movie Stab 3, alerting the attentions of Sidney, Dewey and Gale(n)

Norm MacDonald stars as a chauffeur who decides to get revenge on his wealthy boss by kidnapping her dog. Produced under the titles Pittsburgh, Ballbusted, and Foolproof, Screwed also stars Danny De Vito, Dave Chappelle, Sherman Helmsley, Elaine Stritch, and Sarah Silverman(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman (Ben Affleck) and Superman (Henry Cavill) clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world, while the public they're defending is becoming increasingly mindful of the damage that superheroes and masked vigilantes cause. However, the duo are soon forced to confront an even greater threat created by nefarious billionaire Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg). Directed by Zack Snyder, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice also co-stars Amy Adams as Lois Lane, Jeremy Irons as Alfred the butler, and Gal Gadot as Wonder Woman(n)

programme.title: Tour de Pharmacy
programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells(n)

programme.title: Towelhead
programme.desc: Six Feet Under creator and American Beauty screenwriter Alan Ball makes his feature directorial debut with this screen adaptation of author Alicia Erian's controversial novel Towelhead. Jasira (Summer Bishil) is a 13-year-old Arab-American who's contending with the pains of adolescence when her life takes a sudden and unexpected turn. Sent to live with her stern Lebanese father, Rifat (Peter Macdissi), by her self-absorbed mother (Maria Bello), Jasira finds herself struggling to adjust to life in the suburbs while contending with racism and hypocrisy at every turn. Rifat lives in a modest, suburban Houston home next to racist reservist Mr. Vuoso (Aaron Eckhart) and meddling expectant mother Melina (Toni Collette). Adjusting to life in the suburbs isn't easy for young Jasira, though she tries her hardest to adapt to the unfamiliar environment by striking up casual conversations with her curious new neighbors. In the process, Jasira finds herself increasingly attracted to hormone-driven African-American teen Thomas (Eugene Jones). When Rifat finds out that his daughter's new boyfriend is black, he vehemently condemns the relationship. As America launches its initial invasion of Iraq, Jasira finds herself caught up in a potentially explosive situation that is only compounded by her raging hormones and the snooping of her pregnant, busybody neighbor(n)

programme.title: Citizen U.S.A.: A 50 State Road Trip

Queen Latifah and Alicia Keys costar in this heartwarming adaptation of the best seller by Sue Monk Kidd. Sophie Okonedo, Paul Bettany. Written and directed by Gina Prince-Bythewood(n)

Ordered to take a leave of absence from the police department, Monk hires Sharona, a nurse who helps him try to get reinstated on the force, and in the process, becomes an unlikely Dr. Watson to his Sherlock Holmes. When the police department find themselves unable to crack a high-profile case, they have no choice but to bring back the only man for the job...phobias and all(n)

programme.title: Mystery Woman: Game Time
programme.desc: This Hallmark Channel TV movie is one of several starring Kellie Martin as Samantha "Sam" Kinsey, the owner of a British-style American bookshop which traffics in mystery novels. This time out, Sam scores a coup when she manages to get reclusive mystery writer Donald Fiske (William Katt) to make a rare personal appearance at her "Mystery Woman" bookshop. Also on hand is the writer's bitchy wife Jody (Sheree J. Wilson) and his troubled son Cameron (AJ Trauth), not to mention a somewhat disreputable videogame developer named Randy (Jamie Elman), who has persuaded Sam to carry his latest creation, an addictive game called "Whodunnit?", in her store. When Fiske is murdered, Randy is the primary suspect, the result of an ownership squabble over "Whodunnit" which not only involved the dead man, but also some very shady characters from Russia. Though Randy seems to be guilty as hell, Sam nonetheless works overtime to prove his innocence, a task complicated when Sam is assaulted and Jody is kidnapped. Mystery Woman: Game Time premiered August 21, 2005(n)

programme.title: Mystery Woman: At First Sight

programme.title: Mystery Woman: Oh Baby

programme.title: Mystery Woman: Redemption
programme.desc: While Samantha Kinsey's Mystery Woman bookstore is closed for renovations, she's been volunteering at The Haven, an AA shelter for indigents run by Reverend Tucker. Some of them, like Murphy, are hard cases who refuse to stay sober. Others like Jim Carter, a drifter just passing through town, sincerely believe that redemption is possible. Samantha's curious affection for this lost soul only grows when he's found murdered outside The Haven. Police Chief Connor insists that it was a robbery gone wrong. Samantha has her doubts, which are heightened when she is bequeathed from Jim an intricately carved box containing a personal message to the daughter he abandoned and entrusting Samantha with the mission to find her and deliver it. He also lefta message for Samantha: You like mysteries. Here's one to remember me by..(n)

programme.desc: Larry Charles's spoof documentary follows Borat Sagdiyev, Kazakhstan's leading journalist and TV presenter, as he travels through the heart of America in an attempt to understand the land of the free and the home of the brave. Along the way, he's able to congratulate a packed rodeo crowd for their country's 'war of terror', enjoy a dinner with the cream of Southern society and engage in an unforgettable hotel-room wrestle that spills into a shocked conference hall. Sacha Baron Cohen stars as the eponymous Borat, scabrously exposing smalltown America's prejudices in the company of his producer Azamat Bagatov. Other highlights include the two men engaged in nude wrestling and, of course, Borat's kidnapping of Pamela Anderson. In English, and Romanian, Hebrew, Polish and Armenian with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Live Pre-Season Football
programme.desc: Arsenal v Chelsea (Kick-off 12.40pm). Coverage of the friendly match at Bird's Nest Stadium in Beijing, China, where the Premier League teams continue preparations for the new season. After finishing outside of the Champions League qualification places last term, Arsenal will be looking to ensure they silence some of their critics and challenge for the title in the coming campaign, and this match against the reigning champions should illustrate whether their ambitions are realistic at this early stage, or whether they still have much room for improvement. Celina Hinchcliffe presents, with analysis from Kevin Campbell and Tony Cascarino, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Matthew Upson.(n)

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Game show, hosted by Ben Shephard, in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.(n)

programme.title: The Chase

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: Unassuming hobbit Bilbo Baggins is pulled out of his comfortable life when Gandalf the wizard volunteers him for a dangerous quest. He joins a party of dwarves who are on a mission to reclaim their lost homeland, which has been taken over by a dragon. When the group journeys into the Misty Mountains, Bilbo becomes separated from the dwarves and falls into a cave, where he finds himself confronted by Gollum and forced to play a riddle game. It is set in Middle-earth 60 years before the events of The Lord of the Rings and is the first part of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy based on JRR Tolkien's novel, starring Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage, James Nesbitt, Ken Stott, Cate Blanchett, Ian Holm and Christopher Lee.(n)

Convinced he needs to make a fresh start, he begins stealing cash from the mail, and finds an ally in 15-year-old illiterate truant Damien, who agrees to help him on his rounds. However, it is not long before the neighbours start questioning their unlikely friendship. With Melanie Hill and Michael Taylor.(n)

programme.desc: A respected gynaecologist is accused of sexually assaulting a patient during a routine examination, but Brooks, Devlin and Chandler struggle to find any firm evidence and the team becomes divided. Crown Prosecutor Alesha Phillips refuses to accept defeat and takes on formidable defence barrister Phyllis Gladstone. Crime drama, guest starring Derek Riddell and Lesley Manville, with Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber, Harriet Walter and Freema Agyeman.(n)

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part two of two. Chris Collins admits he concealed a relationship with the killer's latest victim and is therefore a potential target himself. As Tony delves into the sordid world of Bradfield's sadomasochism scene, he realises he must protect Alex from the full horror of the crimes, and when his temporary assistant goes missing he is left to battle it out with the elusive enemy alone. Drama, starring Robson Green, with Simone Lahbib and Cristian Solimeno.(n)

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: Police drama chronicling the career of a risk-taking officer over three decades as she progresses through the Met ranks. In 1985, novice WPC Denise Woods becomes emotionally involved in the rape and murder of 15-year-old Amy Reid, whom she happened to meet the night before she was killed. As the investigation hits a wall amid the chaos of the Brixton riots, Denise takes matters into her own hands. Starring Hayley Atwell, Richard Coyle and Con O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Prime Suspect
programme.sub-title: Prime Suspect V: Errors of Judgement.
programme.desc: Tough Superintendent Jane Tennison is transferred to the Manchester police force, where her uncompromising methods soon create a stir among her more conventionally minded colleagues. Called on to investigate the murder of a local drug dealer, she is unconvinced by an all-too-convenient confession from a 14-year-old possible suspect and decides to pursue her own line of inquiry - homing in on the victim's former boss, a drugs kingpin known only as `The Street'. Helen Mirren, John McArdle and Steven Mackintosh star.(n)

programme.title: Mr Selfridge

programme.title: Davina McCall: Life at the Extreme
programme.desc: The TV presenter examines how animals survive in hostile environments by visiting some of the hottest, coldest, deepest and wettest places on Earth to experience life in extreme conditions. She begins in the deserts of Namibia in south-west Africa, and discovers it home to an incredibly diverse range of life despite the high temperatures and lack of water. Davina goes head-to-head in a running race against a cheetah, camps in the sand dunes overnight and stays with San bushpeople to learn the skills that they have developed to survive.(n)

Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

Action thriller, with Wesley Snipes, Bruce Payne, Tom Sizemore, Alex Datcher, Bruce Greenwood and Elizabeth Hurley.(n)

programme.title: Outside Edge
programme.desc: As Brent Park looks ahead to a new season, Roger tries to make amends with Miriam before whipping the team into shape. Cricketing comedy drama, starring Brenda Blethyn.(n)

programme.desc: Hazel Bellamy is daunted by a social invitation to spend the weekend at Somerby Park where she falls victim to a cruel prank. James's belief that she brought about her own downfall leads to her packing her bags and returning to London.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: An unusually busy night proves too much for the A&E staff, driving a stressed-out Robert to lose his cool as the ward descends into chaos. The death of an elderly patient left unsupervised in a corridor and a violent confrontation involving her son brings matters to a head - and to add to Robert's woes, an aggrieved Christine questions his motives in offering her the consultancy. Meanwhile, Cathy can't believe her ears when Mike makes a stunning announcement. Hospital drama, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack, David Harewood and Jane Slavin.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Tongues start wagging when a stranger from America goes into business with Greengrass, and Kate has her work cut out looking after a flu-stricken Nick. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard and Nick Berry.(n)

programme.desc: The actress finally finds happiness in America, where she is greeted as a celebrity.(n)

programme.sub-title: Time of the Wolf - Part One.

programme.title: Outside Edge
programme.desc: Dervish and Co are back at the crease but with ball tampering and rule bending rife, a fair game seems out of the question. Cricketing comedy drama, starring Brenda Blethyn, Robert Daws, Timothy Spall and Josie Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Things may be about to change for Nick when a new inspector arrives and Kate receives a job offer. Elsewhere, Greengrass struggles with his finances. Rural drama, starring Nick Berry and Bill Maynard. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Richard's mother-in-law visits Eaton Place for Christmas with her grand-daughter Georgina, who causes panic in the household by disappearing to the East End with the maid.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Christine's promotion to Consultant, and the arrival of an ambitious new trauma surgeon, seriously unsettles her relationship with department boss Robert Kingsford, while Stuart is stunned to learn he's not the father of Louise's baby.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Millionaire Gordon Cloade's wife is widowed for the second time at the tender age of 23, arousing the suspicions of his impoverished relatives. Fanning the flames of envy and hatred, psychic aunt Kathy Cloade reveals the grieving widow's first husband is in fact still alive, and a second death prompts Poirot to delve deeper into the family's dark secrets. David Suchet stars, with Jenny Agutter, Tim Piggot-Smith and Celia Imrie.(n)

programme.title: DCI Banks
programme.desc: Part one of two. When the body of student Josh Tate is found dumped in a ravine, the investigation into his stabbing uncovers a very different man to the quiet character described by his flatmate Spencer. It emerges that Josh was infatuated with Spencer's girlfriend and had been manufacturing Ecstasy for club owner Liam Fallon. Meanwhile, DI Morton's ex-lover Martin Hexton has arrived, claiming to be working on a local case. When Fallon comes under suspicion as Josh's murderer the detectives break into his flat and find him badly beaten - and to complicate matters, it looks as if Hexton is responsible.(n)

programme.title: DCI Banks
programme.desc: Part two of two. Morton works hard to win back Banks's approval and discovers Hexton is the biological father of murdered student Josh. The team traces the former undercover police officer to Gerald and Elaine Foster's house, but it's too late - Hexton has kidnapped lap-dancer Melanie. When his victim collapses, however, he takes her to hospital, where ex-lover Helen corners him and has him arrested. What will he reveal about Josh and Melanie, and the attack on club owner Liam? Stephen Tompkinson stars.(n)

programme.title: Broadchurch
programme.desc: Information from a new witness turns Ellie and Hardy's understanding of the case upside down, while Katie discovers a crucial new link to a key suspect and Beth comes forward with new revelations. Lucas reveals what he saw on the night of the party, but Jim reacts violently and tells him to keep his mouth shut, while a call from the owner at Axehampton forces Ellie and Hardy to hurry back to the grounds of the house once more. Crime drama, starring David Tennant, Olivia Colman and Julie Hesmondhalgh.(n)

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: A vulnerable young man is reported missing by his pub landlord boss. Syndicate 9 suspect Robin McKendrick may have been killed after a photo of him bound and gagged in a car boot appears online. However, the case takes an unusual turn when a body found in a flooded quarry turns out to be a woman's corpse. Meanwhile, battle-scarred from their conflict last year, Scott and Bailey are determined to move forward with honesty. The pair find themselves in front of the promotion board and pass with flying colours, leaving Gill with the task of choosing who stays on as sergeant at the department. Danny Webb joins a cast led by Lesley Sharp and Suranne Jones.(n)

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Syndicate 9 find themselves dealing with a high-profile historical case after Mandy Sweeting's body is recovered from a quarry, 23 years after she was first reported missing. However, Rachel's biggest challenge might not be dealing with the media attention or even re-interviewing bereft family members, but hiding her contempt for Rob Waddington's father Frankie (former Coronation Street star Ian Mercer), who led the original investigation. Meanwhile, Janet also has problems to deal with at home, as Elise moves in with her dad and his new girlfriend. But at least it inspires the detective to look at her own love life, as she confides in Rachel that she's started using dating sites. Crime drama, starring Suranne Jones, Lesley Sharp and Danny Miller.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Richard Abernethie is found dead shortly after disinheriting his sole heir and specifying that his legacy is to be divided equally among the remaining family members. Poirot is called in by his solicitor friend Gilbert Entwhistle, to ascertain whether the late Mr Abernethie met with foul play - and also finds time to investigate the murder of a beneficiary under the new terms of the will. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Robert Bathurst, Anna Calder-Marshall and Geraldine James.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone

His efforts are not exactly helped by the client's refusal to speak - leaving him to wonder whether he is suffering from shell-shock brought on by a tour of Bosnia or whether he has something to hide. Starring John Thaw, with John Wood, Richard Pasco, Lisa Harrow and Nicholas Jones.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Kate seeks Nick's advice about one of her patients, who seems to be receiving threats, and Greengrass tries to take the law into his own hands. Dora Bryan guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick is left with a sore head following an incident in a graveyard, and Blaketon experiences trouble at home. Rural drama, starring Nick Berry and Derek Fowlds.(n)

programme.desc: A hit-and-run incident alerts Nick to the presence of badger-baiters in the village, but the outsiders from Middlesbrough will stop at nothing in pursuit of their `sport'. Meanwhile, Greengrass finds a way of making racehorse ownership pay.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The aftermath of the Titanic disaster causes conflict within the household, as Miss Forrest gradually assumes more responsibility - and no one is more incensed than Lady Bellamy's personal maid, who escaped the tragedy on a life-raft.(n)

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Robin is bewitched by evil sorceress Lilith, who sends him on a mission to steal the magical silver arrow from Herne's cave. Michael Praed stars.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Blue Train.
programme.desc: The sleuth finds himself in interesting company as English socialites and American millionaires rub shoulders on board a train bound for the French Riviera. Passengers include oil magnate Rufus Van Aldin (Elliott Gould) and his daughter Ruth (Jaime Murray) - to whom he has given a magnificent ruby known as the Heart of Fire. With members of the aristocracy crammed into a confined space with their husbands, lovers and a renowned gemstone, murder cannot be far away. With Lindsay Duncan, Roger Lloyd Pack and James D'Arcy.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Richard Abernethie is found dead shortly after disinheriting his sole heir and specifying that his legacy is to be divided equally among the remaining family members. Poirot is called in by his solicitor friend Gilbert Entwhistle, to ascertain whether the late Mr Abernethie met with foul play - and also finds time to investigate the murder of a beneficiary under the new terms of the will. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Robert Bathurst, Anna Calder-Marshall and Geraldine James.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: When a body is dredged up from a slurry pit on a remote farm, the investigation forces owner Danny Pryor to admit he has a number of illegal Serbian workers on the payroll. A faded tattoo identifies the victim as Jack Reeves, a young man from the local travelling community, but what is his connection to the immigrants? As the case unfolds, Vera and her team must connect the dots between Jack and a wounded Serbian, and expose the tragic truth at the heart of Pryor Farm. With Mark Bonnar, Mark Womack and Jim Sturgeon.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: When dock worker Owen Thorne plunges from the roof of a multi-storey car park while picking up his daughter from her school prom, Vera immediately detects foul play. The team soon discovers a work dispute over the death of a young man, with everyone believing Owen was to blame, and the victim's father admits he wanted revenge - but his alibi holds. The mystery then continues when Vera spots an inconsistency in the statement Owen's wife gave to the police, suggesting she's not certain of her husband's fidelity.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: The team pulls out all the stops to save a newborn foal when it is found with its abandoned mother.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Animal cruelty investigator Barbara Christiansen rescues a horse found lying in a pool of water after heavy rain.(n)

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: The case of University of Massachusetts student Charles Allen Jr, who was due to meet a friend before a party but never showed up. The same day in October 2007, the 22-year-old had told his sister that he feared people were after him.(n)

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Recollecting the 1988 terrorist attack of Pan Am Flight 103 over Scotland. The explosion at 30,000ft killed all 243 passengers, 16 crew and a further 11 people on the ground. Plus, the mayor of a London borough who was plagued by scandal during his time in office.(n)

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: The home-grown terrorist group that planned a jihad through a series of bombings in California. Officials referred to it as the most operationally advanced plot since 9/11.(n)

programme.title: Judge Jeanine Pirro
programme.desc: Courtroom programme featuring prominent US legal commentator and former District Attorney and County Judge Jeanine Pirro as the presiding jurist.(n)

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: A hunting accident turns sinister when an informant links a teenager's death to a man willing to kill for money.(n)

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.sub-title: The Devil Went Down to Georgia.
programme.desc: The case of Jerry Glaser, who became increasingly convinced someone was trying to kill him. Encounters with a peeping tom outside his daughter's bedroom window and a masked man in his hallway prompted him to take matters his own hands to protect himself and his family.(n)

programme.title: Unravelled: Countdown to a Kill
programme.desc: How the forbidden teenage romance between 14-year-old Malika Willoughby and high school basketball champion Roz Ross led to an unforeseen outcome, changing their lives for ever.(n)

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: How DNA and ballistics analysis using cutting-edge technology are being used to bring criminals to justice.(n)

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: How toxicologists search for hidden clues in blood and tissue to bring murders to light, including the case of a wife poisoned by cyanide.(n)

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of Louisiana student Mickey Shunick, who went missing after a night out in May 2012. Police failed to make a breakthrough until they spoted her on surveillance footage. Eventually a registered sex offender pleaded guilty to killing the 21-year-old, and also being responsible for the death of another woman whose body had been found in September 1999.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: The murder of 54-year-old Pennsylvania landlady Beth Grosskopf in May 2009. Her tenant, Benjamin Dennerlein, stabbed her over 30 times after being threatened with eviction.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Deadliest Lovers
programme.desc: The case of Portuguese national Hugo Quintas, who was instantly drawn to Hayley Richards. They had a passionate love affair, but when she fell pregnant, his jealousy led to murder.(n)

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: A case in which a young mother was stabbed four times in the chest and left for dead in the French Broad River. She liveed long enough to leave a cryptic clue for detectives.(n)

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.sub-title: Roses Are Red, Murder Is Too.
programme.desc: The death of a town council member. Local residents were appalled - especially when the evidence began to suggest a professional `hit' had taken place.(n)

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: A case in which a mother failed to return home from work on a winter's night. As dawn broke, her murdered body was found in a nearby churchyard, and CCTV was called upon to solve the mystery of her death.(n)

programme.title: Copycat Killers
programme.desc: The case of Oklahoma teenagers Sarah Edmondson and Ben Darras, who decided to take the road trip from hell in March 1995. Their crimes were random, senseless and without remorse. Darras shot and killed businessman William Savage in Mississippi and Edmondson seriously wounded store clerk Patsy Byers in Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: A case in which a man called emergency services for help, but was unwilling to give his address. As detectives investigated, they uncovered a shocking tale of torture, revenge and deadly unrequited love.(n)

programme.title: Hear No Evil
